/-- Given the following diagram with `S ‚ü∂ S'` a monomorphism,

```
    X ‚ü∂ X'

        S ‚ü∂ S'
      ‚Üó      ‚Üó
    Y ‚ü∂ Y'
```

```
      X √ó[S] Y ‚ü∂ (X' √ó[S'] Y') √ó[Y'] Y

          ‚Üì                  ‚Üì
(X' √ó[S'] Y') √ó[X'] X ‚ü∂ X' √ó[S'] Y'
```

is a pullback square. The diagonal map of this square is `pullback.map`.
Also see `pullback_lift_map_is_pullback`.

        (pullback.fst _ _ : pullback (pullback.snd _ _ : pullback f' g' ‚ü∂ _) i‚ÇÇ ‚ü∂ _) ‚âÖ
      pullback f g where
  hom :=
    pullback.lift (pullback.fst _ _ ‚â´ pullback.snd _ _) (pullback.snd _ _ ‚â´ pullback.snd _ _)
      (by
        rw [‚Üê cancel_mono i‚ÇÉ, Category.assoc, Category.assoc, Category.assoc, Category.assoc, e‚ÇÅ,
          e‚ÇÇ, ‚Üê pullback.condition_assoc, pullback.condition_assoc, pullback.condition,
          pullback.condition_assoc])
  inv :=

      (pullback.lift (pullback.map _ _ _ _ _ _ _ e‚ÇÅ e‚ÇÇ) (pullback.fst _ _) (pullback.lift_fst ..))
      (pullback.lift (pullback.map _ _ _ _ _ _ _ e‚ÇÅ e‚ÇÇ) (pullback.snd _ _) (pullback.lift_snd ..))

    ¬∑ apply pullback.hom_ext

        ¬∑ simp only [Category.assoc, lift_fst, lift_fst_assoc, Category.id_comp]
          rw [condition]
        ¬∑ simp [Category.assoc, lift_snd, condition_assoc, condition]

    ¬∑ apply pullback.hom_ext

        ¬∑ simp only [Category.assoc, lift_snd, lift_fst_assoc, lift_snd_assoc, Category.id_comp]
